thread.title: Great,location and very comfortable.
thread.title_full: Great,location and very comfortable. - Review of Premier Inn London City (Aldgate) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: 527evaw
title: Great,location and very comfortable.
text: Location was perfect for exploring London. Hotel very comfortable with friendly service. Loads of restaurants to choose from within A few minutes walking distance of hotel. Very interesting part of London historically and easy to get to some great markets (overland train to Hackney for example). We really enjoyed our visit and will return to catch some galleries we couldn't fit in this time round.
